name: Kentucky Airmotive, Inc.
about: Kentucky Airmotive Inc., located in Mount Sterling, Kentucky, has been a trusted name in aviation since 1972 and a renowned flight school since 1985. We offer comprehensive flight training programs, including private, instrument, and commercial instruction, available seven days a week. Utilizing our own fleet of Cessna aircraft and in-house maintenance, we ensure reliable and efficient training. As a PSI FAA written test center, we provide written tests five days a week. Our services extend beyond flight training to include charters, avionics and maintenance, aircraft management, and FBO services. With a commitment to safety, reliability, and exceptional service, Kentucky Airmotive Inc. is your one-stop shop for all aviation needs. Call 859-498-1000 to embark on your aviation journey today.
